participant_1.background:
I love a good home-cooked meal, especially when it comes from my mom's kitchen.
I'm afraid that my cats will get too hot in the summer and that I won't be able to help them.
I love my parents very much.
My parents are both very supportive of my dream to be a veterinarian.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.

participant_2.background:
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
my suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
i like my job.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
I started spending more time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello, how are you today?
I am well, thank you for asking! How are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am just getting ready to start my day.
Oh, that's exciting! What are you doing today?
I am going to be working on my beauty business. I have been selling cosmetics in my spare time and helping my sister Madonna with her business.
That's so great! I am sure you are doing a great job.
Thank you! I am trying my best.
What do you enjoy most about your job?
I enjoy helping people feel beautiful. I also love working with my sister.
That's wonderful! I am sure your customers love your products.
Thank you! I hope so!
What do you do in your spare time?
I spend a lot of time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.
That's great! I am sure your family loves spending time with you.
Yes, they do! I love spending time with them.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to cook, garden, and read. I also love to spend time with my cats.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time! I love to cook and read as well.
That's great! We should talk about our favorite recipes sometime.
I would love that!
